topic: How to benchmark notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to benchmark notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Benchmarking Notebooks to Production with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to benchmark Jupyter notebooks for optimal performance when transitioning them to production using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand the differences between Jupyter Notebooks and production environments
Implement strategies for scaling and handling heavy traffic
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for using FastAPI and its latest features
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or later is recommended
caveats: Ensure proper input validation and error handling in your FastAPI endpoints
Optimize database queries, if applicable, for better performance
Implement asynchronous tasks when dealing with heavy computations or multiple requests
